posts.post_content:
Hey All,

Everything Has SOLD, a few will be in the MAY REA

COLTON

Thanks for all the replies!! We are rocking right along.

I will try to continue to update this post in regards to what has been SOLD


ALL CARDS HAVE SOLD or will be in the May REA, thanks all



.

Billy, thanks for posting a link, much appreciated

I have replied to all emails and PMs up to this point and I’m turning in for the night, all other emails received tonight will be replied to in the morning

Cheers All

Colton
Colton just sent you another email with a bit longer list.  Bob I.

THANKS EVERYONE!!

In less than 1 day,  56 of the 189 available cards have SOLD

Multiple others are in negotiations, but LOTS of great off-backs remaining

Cheers,
Colton

At this moment, I believe I am caught up on PMs and Emails, So if you are waiting on a response from me, I must have missed something, shoot me an email and I will get caught up

Much Thanks, Keep those Offers Coming, Motivated to Keep Moving these guys

Lots of off-backs remaining, well over 100 graded EPDG, Sov150 and/or Tolstois remain

Cheers All
of course my spreadsheet crashed and i don't know my common needs...

Ok guys, most folks at this point are just asking for prices, so send me a list of the cards you are interested in and I will get you GRADES AND PRICES.

In a couple weeks, I will start listing some on the BST with scans & prices, but for now I am going to try and sell off as many this way as possible, talk soon

Colton

Bump

Hey All, I now have everything priced, just email me and I will send over lists of all remaining cards grades & Prices
